verses.verse: The Kohanim <WH3548> the L'vi'im <WH3881>, and all the tribe <WH7626> of Levi <WH3878>, shall have no part <WH2506> nor inheritance <WH5159> with Yisra'EL <WH3478>: they shall eat <WH398> <WH8799> the offerings <WH801> of the YY <WH3068> made by fire <WH801>, and his inheritance <WH5159>.
Therefore shall they have no inheritance <WH5159> among <WH7130> their brethren <WH251>: the YY <WH3068> is their inheritance <WH5159>, as he hath said <WH1696> <WH8765> unto them.

And this shall be the Kohen's <WH3548> due <WH4941> from the people <WH5971>, from them that offer <WH2076> <WH8802> a sacrifice <WH2077>, whether it be ox <WH7794> or sheep <WH7716>; and they shall give <WH5414> <WH8804> unto the Kohen <WH3548> the shoulder <WH2220>, and the two cheeks <WH3895>, and the maw <WH6896>.

The firstfruit <WH7225> also of thy corn <WH1715>, of thy wine <WH8492>, and of thine oil <WH3323>, and the first <WH7225> of the fleece <WH1488> of thy sheep <WH6629>, shalt thou give <WH5414> <WH8799> him.

For the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> hath chosen <WH977> <WH8804> him out of all thy tribes <WH7626>, to stand <WH5975> <WH8800> to minister <WH8334> <WH8763> in the name <WH8034> of the YY <WH3068>, him and his sons <WH1121> for ever <WH3117>.

And if a Levi <WH3881> come <WH935> <WH8799> from any <WH259> of thy gates <WH8179> out of all Yisra'EL <WH3478>, where he sojourned <WH1481> <WH8802>, and come <WH935> <WH8804> with all the desire <WH185> of his mind <WH5315> unto the place <WH4725> which the YY <WH3068> shall choose <WH977> <WH8799>;

Then he shall minister <WH8334> <WH8765> in the name <WH8034> of the YY <WH3068> his 'Elohim <WH430>, as all his brethren <WH251> the L'vi'im <WH3881> do, which stand <WH5975> <WH8802> there before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>.
They shall have like portions <WH2506> to eat <WH398> <WH8799>, beside that which cometh of the sale <WH4465> of his patrimony <WH1>.

When thou art come <WH935> <WH8802> into the land <WH776> which the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> giveth <WH5414> <WH8802> thee, thou shalt not learn <WH3925> <WH8799> to do <WH6213> <WH8800> after the abominations <WH8441> of those nations <WH1471>.

There shall not be found <WH4672> <WH8735> among you any one that maketh his son <WH1121> or his daughter <WH1323> to pass <WH5674> <WH8688> through the fire <WH784>, or that useht <WH7080> <WH8802> divination <WH7081>, or an observer of times <WH6049> <WH8781>, or an enchanter <WH5172> <WH8764>, or a witch <WH3784> <WH8764>,
Or a charmer <WH2266> <WH8802> <WH2267>, or a consulter <WH7592> <WH8802> with familiar spirits <WH178>, or a wizard <WH3049>, or a necromancer <WH1875> <WH8802> <WH4191> <WH8801>.

For all that do <WH6213> <WH8802> these things are an abomination <WH8441> unto the YY <WH3068>: and because <WH1558> of these abominations <WH8441> the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> doth drive them out <WH3423> <WH8688> from before <WH6440> thee.
Thou shalt be perfect <WH8549> with the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430>.

For these nations <WH1471>, which thou shalt possess <WH3423> <WH8802>, hearkened <WH8085> <WH8799> unto observers of times <WH6049> <WH8781>, and unto diviners <WH7080> <WH8802>: but as for thee, the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> hath not suffered <WH5414> <WH8804> thee so to do.

The YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> will raise up <WH6965> <WH8686> unto thee a Prophet <WH5030> from the midst <WH7130> of thee, of thy brethren <WH251>, like unto me; unto him ye shall hearken <WH8085> <WH8799>;

According to all that thou desiredst <WH7592> <WH8804> of the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> in Horev <WH2722> in the day <WH3117> of the assembly <WH6951>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Let me not hear <WH8085> <WH8800> again <WH3254> <WH8686> the voice <WH6963> of the YY <WH3068> my 'Elohim <WH430>, neither let me see <WH7200> <WH8799> this great <WH1419> fire <WH784> any more, that I die <WH4191> <WH8799> not.
And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto me, They have well <WH3190> <WH8689> spoken that which they have spoken <WH1696> <WH8765>.

I will raise them up <WH6965> <WH8686> a Prophet <WH5030> from among <WH7130> their brethren <WH251>, like unto thee, and will put <WH5414> <WH8804> my words <WH1697> in his mouth <WH6310>; and he shall speak <WH1696> <WH8765> unto them all that I shall command <WH6680> <WH8762> him.

And it shall come to pass, that whosoever <WH376> will not hearken <WH8085> <WH8799> unto my words <WH1697> which he shall speak <WH1696> <WH8762> in my name <WH8034>, I will require <WH1875> <WH8799> it of him.

But the prophet <WH5030>, which shall presume <WH2102> <WH8686> to speak <WH1696> <WH8763> a word <WH1697> in my name <WH8034>, which I have not commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> him to speak <WH1696> <WH8763>, or that shall speak <WH1696> <WH8762> in the name <WH8034> of other <WH312> 'elohim <WH430>, even that prophet <WH5030> shall die <WH4191> <WH8804>.
And if thou say <WH559> <WH8799> in thine heart <WH3824>, How shall we know <WH3045> <WH8799> the word <WH1697> which the YY <WH3068> hath not spoken <WH1696> <WH8765> ?

When a prophet <WH5030> speaketh <WH1696> <WH8762> in the name <WH8034> of the YY <WH3068>, if the thing <WH1697> follow not, nor come to pass <WH935> <WH8799>, that is the thing <WH1697> which the YY <WH3068> hath not spoken <WH1696> <WH8765>, but the prophet <WH5030> hath spoken <WH1696> <WH8765> it presumptuously <WH2087>: thou shalt not be afraid <WH1481> <WH8799> of him.
